metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11098 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In FreeRDP before version 2.1.2, there is an out-of-bound read inglyph_cache_put. This affects all FreeRDP clients with `+glyph-cache`option enabled This is fixed in version 2.1.2.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-11098` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp2-shadow-x11 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
freerdp2-wayland - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
freerdp2-x11 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libfreerdp-client2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libfreerdp-server2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libfreerdp-shadow-subsystem2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libfreerdp-shadow2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libfreerdp2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libuwac0-0 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwinpr-tools2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
libwinpr2-2 - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
winpr-utils - 2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.0+dfsg1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
freerdp package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and needs fixing.
